data.title: Finest food in town
data.text: Fuentes Cafe Downton is pretty much a monument in San Angelo TX.  You know the food is good because its always busy.  The food is always good.

data.title: Decent Mexican American
data.text: I have eaten here a few times and I have not very impressed, typical Tex-mex food and a little pricey. Not a single plate stands out as a must try. It's an OK place to grab a quick lunch in Downtown San Angelo.

data.title: Nothing special
data.text: I was here with a big group for a birthday party and the food was just average. There was nothing that really stuck out to me as Mexican restaurants around here are a dime a dozen.

data.title: Consistantly very good.
data.text: The food at Fuentes is a good value and you can always count on the quality.  The service is attentive and friendly.

data.title: Friendly and fast service
data.text: After driving for a bit in San Angelo looking for a place to eat, we were about to give up and go back to our hotel, when we ended up downtown and saw this restaurant and thought we'd give it a go. The salsa was good, with a little kick and the food was good too, and came out really fast.  My only complaint would be that I ordered a plate that had an appetizer and as the food came out so fast, it came out with the meal and they placed a guacamole salad on a molten plate, two things that aren't really that major. The service was wonderful and everyone greeted us and said good-bye. If I'm in SA again, I'll definitely be stopping back in.

data.title: Yummy food
data.text: We went with another couple and had great food and service.  Food was authentic and the location was convenient to downtown.

data.title: Great Food, Great Drinks
data.text: The food was Excellent and Staff was Excellent! I give it an Excellent Review.  Order the Patron Margarita.

data.title: A good place for drinks and dancing
data.text: Fuentes is a great place for a night out. If you want great drinks and a place for dancing, it is a place to see. I don't care too much for crowds so Fuentes allows you to have fun with no headache of too many people. Hometown favorite.

data.title: Always good!
data.text: John (owner) knows how to run a restaurant! I've been eating here for over 31 years. The food is always delicious. Staff is friendly, and restaurant is clean. All their food is good, but I especially like the skinny enchiladas! You won't go wrong with anything you order.

data.title: Average at best
data.text: Had the chicken qusidilla they were average. I have been here 3 or 4 times and it's good food. Nothing great. Atmosphere is this places best frature.

data.title: Good Mexican Food
data.text: Sunday Turkey and dressing special is very tasty.  You might want to ask them to heat it up before serving.  MIxed nachos are delicious either mixed with beaf and bean or shredded chicken and beans.  Yum!  Midtowner and Chicken calavasa plate are also some of my favorites.

data.title: Fair to medium
data.text:
Although this is one of the oldest traditional Mexican food places in San Angelo.  It just isn't up to par with some of the other Mexican places in town.  If you want sour cream & order it that charge will be added on to your tab.  Service is good and  the atmosphere is pleasant.  The only outstanding dish in my opinion is the calabasas y pollo.
For great enchiladas look elsewhere.

data.title: Old time Tex Mex
data.text: We wanted authentic Tex Mex and found it at Fuentes. Good margaritas, guacamole and the beans were great. Green chile quesadillas used canned chiles, but it was still good. Service was fast and friendly.

data.title: Average at best.
data.text: Heard about this place for years and was excited to try it.  I was disappointed. Service was not attentive nor friendly.  Food was okay but over priced for what you got.  Wait time for food was excessive.

data.title: Skinny Enchiladas, Full Flavor
data.text:
Went there for lunch as it was within walking distance from the hotel.  I was not disappointed.  The salsa they serve was wonderful.  

I ordered the skinny enchiladas and they were also wonderful.  The sauce was light and I was able to shop the entire afternoon without feeling full and miserable.

data.title: Delicious food.
data.text: We specifically were told to find this place otherwise would not have ran into it as it is in the center of Downtown San Angelo.  We were seated fairly quickly and the server/waitress was very kind and helpful.  I was super glad to order a recommendation by the waitress and loved it!  Food was hot and delicious, and the atmosphere was very nice.  I will make it a point to return to this restaurant if ever passing through San Angelo again.  :)

data.title: Enchiladas
data.text: They have great cheese enchiladas here.  They have good food, just not the best in town.  Go to Paisano's for the best Tex-Mex around San Angelo.  Don't order the fish tacos, they made me sick.

data.title: Excellent margaritas!
data.text: Good service, good mexican, all at reasonable prices. Be sure to go with a big appetite. The waitress was very attentive.

data.title: Old School Favorite
data.text: This Restaurant has been in the Family business for around 50 years. Traditional, SouthWest and Tex mex are all go to favorites. Fuentes has a large menu that also includes American food such as steaks, and seafood. Also discounts for the kids and seniors, and a reduced portions option. Fajitas come out on a sizzling platter with all the trimmings. The fish tacos and tortilla soup are very good. My friends always order the enchilada plate (there are many different varieties of enchiladas to choose from). Prices are reasonable. There is a bar in the back which features live music onthe weekends. The owner walks around and greets customers, making sure everything is up to par, and make sure the guests are treated well.

data.title: Real Tex Mex made fresh when you order
data.text: We have been here too many times to count and never had a bad meal or a problem.  I have even met a large group here during lunch hour and it was perfect.  This restaurant has been written about in Texas and nationally. It is that good.
